name: DeltaGreen® Stainless Steel Cleaner DG-400
description: DeltaGreen® Stainless Steel Cleaner DG-400 is a soy bean oil and surfactant based formula that easily polishes and protects stainless steel surfaces. Removes fingerprints, water spots, and food stains. Leaves a high gloss, protective shine. Deltagreen Stainless Steel Cleaner Plus is the “green” choice for cleaner that meets stringent EPA clean air and other environmental challenges faced by today’s solvent users.
